sentences.sContent: He left school at 16 and immersed himself in the Labour Party.
sentences.sCn: 他16岁离开学校投身工党。

phrases.pCn: 全神贯注于，专心于；把…浸入水中

remMethod.val: im(内) + mers(浸没) + e → 向内浸 → 使浸没于； 使沉浸于

trans.tranCn: 使浸没于； 使沉浸于， 使陷入
trans.tranOther: to put someone or something deep into a liquid so that they are completely covered
